products.description: Beige Suede, Pull Tabs, Elasticated Inserts, Leather Linings, Gripped Rubber Soles, Designer Colour: NaturalMulo 's shoes combine the fit and feel of sneakers with all the warm-weather panache of espadrillesThis pair is handmade from tactile suede with leather cushioned-arch footbeds and elasticated insertsThe clean-cut design means they'll work with both casual and smart summer outfitsShown here with A.P.Ctrousers, Acne Studios jacket.

products.description: Tan Suede, Pull Tabs, Elasticated Inserts, Suede Linings, Gripped Rubber SolesWhether you're enjoying a rare hot day in London or are on holiday in Los Angeles, Mulo 's loafers are the shoes you'll want to be wearing, they're crafted over the course of three days in 100 steps, so you can be sure they are exceptionally comfortableThis pair has pull tabs at the back and elasticated inserts, so you don't have to stretch the suede to get them on easilyShown here with J.Crew shorts, Aspesi shirt, A.P.CT-shirt, Bottega Veneta bracelet.

Navy Suede, Pull Tabs, Elasticated Inserts, Suede Linings, Gripped Rubber SolesTo achieve the perfect profile, Mulo uses an Oxford last when making loafersTaking more than 100 steps over the course of three days to craft, this pair has supple navy suede uppers with aerating perforated interiors for comfortThey're set on durable rubber soles that have a ridged finish for better gripShown here with Acne Studios trousers, Albam shirt, AMI T-shirt, Luis Morais bracelet, Mikia bracelet.

products.product_name: Gucci - Appliquéd Logo-Print Loopback Cotton-Jersey Hoodie - Men - Pink
products.description: Multicoloured Loopback Cotton-jersey, Drawstring Hood, Multicoloured Appliqués, Ribbed Trims, 100% Cotton, Made In ItalyGucci 's loopback cotton-jersey hoodie has been made in Italy with not just one, but three distinct brand signatures: two logos and an intricately embroidered dragon appliqué along the shoulderIt's cut for a loose fit and is slightly long in the sleeves, so it feels particularly relaxed and comfyShown here with Gucci trousers, Gucci sneakers.

products.product_name: FPM Milano - Spinner 53cm Aluminium Carry-On Suitcase - Men - Black
products.description: Black Aluminium, Top And Side Handles, Telescopic Handle, Leather Trims (calf), Retractable Luggage Tag, Four Wheels, Internal Divider, Four Leather Straps, Zipped Pocket, Fully Lined, Combination And Butterfly Lock Fastening, Two Combination Padlocks, Weighs Approximately 7.9kg/ 17.4lbs, Designer Colour: Black Caviar, Made In ItalyItalian label FPM Milano draws on the specialist luggage knowledge it's amassed since its foundation in 1946Compact enough to take as carry-on, this 'Spinner' suitcase is constructed from sturdy aluminium, so it's both tough and lightweightIt's set on Japanese-built wheels that ensure you'll roll smoothly through check-in.

products.product_name: Charvet - 8.5cm Checked Silk-Jacquard Tie - Men - Blue
products.description: Navy And Sky-blue Silk-jacquard, 100% Silk, Dry Clean, Made In FranceWhether dressing for a business meeting or a date, you really can't go wrong with a blue tie like Charvet 'sIt's been impeccably made in France from silk and jacquard-woven in a classic check patternTeam it with a white shirt and wide-lapel jacket to complement the 8.5cm bladeShown here with Charvet shirt.

products.product_name: Charvet - 8.5cm Checked Silk-Jacquard Tie - Men - Blue
products.description: Navy And Claret Silk-jacquard, 100% Silk, Dry Clean, Made In FranceThe number one rule to matching a tie to your jacket is to make sure the lapels are proportionate to the blade widthIn a classic 8.5cm cut, this checked Charvet style has been crafted in France from navy and claret silk-jacquardWear it at the office with a white shirtShown here with Charvet shirt.

Plum And Blue Silk-jacquard, 100% Silk, Dry Clean, Made In FranceExperimenting with a bold tie like this Charvet style is an easy way to give your suit a little bit more personalityIt has been hand-cut and stitched in France from fine-grade silk-jacquard in an eye-catching plum and blue dot pattern.

Blue And Pink Silk-jacquard, 100% Silk, Dry Clean, Made In FranceCharvet is credited with putting patterned ties on the map during the Art Deco period, and the storied brand still champions the look todayThis silk-jacquard version has been handcrafted in France with strict attention to detail at every step of the process.

Plum And Navy Silk-jacquard, 100% Silk, Dry Clean, Made In FranceCharvet produces such good ties that the brand name has actually become a general term for the type of silk used to make themExpertly crafted in France, this plum and navy version is jacquard-woven with dots and has a classically cut 8.5cm bladeTry it with a navy or grey suitShown here with Charvet shirt.

Burgundy And Sky-blue Silk-jacquard, 100% Silk, Dry Clean, Made In FranceDedicated fans of Charvet can easily spot the brand's ties, thanks to their high-quality materials and faultless craftsmanshipThis one has been handmade in France from fine-grade silk-jacquard in a burgundy and sky-blue patternShown here with Charvet shirt.

products.product_name: Balenciaga - Printed Loopback Cotton-Jersey Hoodie - Men - Black
products.description: The logo on Balenciaga 's hoodie has been popular since it launched back in 2017, the tongue-in-cheek emblem is often likened to the ones used in political campaignsThis slouchy style is cut from black loopback cotton-jersey and features a front pouch pocket and ribbed trimsShown here with Balenciaga trousers, Balenciaga jacket, Balenciaga sneakers.

products.product_name: SAINT LAURENT - Teddy Leather-Trimmed Wool Bomber Jacket - Men - Black
products.product_category: Clothing > Coats And Jackets > Bomber Jackets
products.description: Saint Laurent 's 'Teddy' bomber jacket has been worn by the likes of Messrs Jeff Goldblum and John Legend, as well as ASAP RockyThis version has been made in Italy from black wool and is accented with tonal leather trims at the shoulders and pocketsShown here with Saint Laurent hoodie, Saint Laurent T-shirt, Saint Laurent jeans, Saint Laurent sneakers.
products.material: 95% Wool / 5% Other Fibres / Trimming: 100% Lamb Leather / Lining: 60% Cupro / 40% Cotton / Pocket Lining: 100% Cotton.

products.product_name: AMIRI - Embellished Suede Jodhpur Boots - Men - Brown
products.description: When it comes to getting dressed, Mr Mike Amiri almost always starts with his brand's jodhpur bootsMade in Italy from camel suede, this pair has signature bandana-trimmed straps and polished curb chains that allow you to adjust the fitThey're set on sturdy soles and stacked heels for a little extra heightShown here with AMIRI jacket, Saint Laurent jeans, AMIRI T-shirt.
